snippet: But a lot more repair work is needed before victory can be declared.
abstract: Editorial welcomes improvements in federal heath insurance Web site; notes prospects have improved for millions of Americans trying to buy policies before December and March 2014 deadlines; warns only a few weeks remain to fix crucial back-end systems that transmit information to insurers.
lead_paragraph: But a lot more repair work is needed before victory can be declared.

headline.main: Fast Recovery for Health Care Website
headline.print_headline: Fast Recovery for Health Care Website

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
